Table of Contents

Interface IEntityConfiguration

Namespace
Ddap.Core
Assembly
Ddap.Core.dll

Represents the configuration for a database entity. This interface defines the metadata and structure of entities loaded from the database.

public interface IEntityConfiguration

Properties

EntityName

Gets the name of the entity (typically the table name).

string EntityName { get; }

Property Value

string

Indexes

Gets the collection of indexes defined for this entity.

IReadOnlyList<IIndexConfiguration> Indexes { get; }

Property Value

IReadOnlyList<IIndexConfiguration>

Properties

Gets the collection of properties/columns for this entity.

IReadOnlyList<IPropertyConfiguration> Properties { get; }

Property Value

IReadOnlyList<IPropertyConfiguration>

Relationships

Gets the collection of relationships for this entity.

IReadOnlyList<IRelationshipConfiguration> Relationships { get; }

Property Value

IReadOnlyList<IRelationshipConfiguration>

SchemaName

Gets the schema name where the entity is located.

string? SchemaName { get; }

Property Value

string
